scripts.build:action: npm run clean:action && tsc -p github-action/tsconfig.action.json && webpack --config webpack.action.js
scripts.build:all: npm run build:web && npm run build:action
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm run build:action
scripts.generate:svg: pnpm exec tsc -p tsconfig.json && node dist/scripts/generate-svg.js
scripts.compare:styles: pnpm exec tsc -p tsconfig.json && node dist/scripts/generate-svg-comparison.js
